basics.name: Matteo Perona
basics.label: Student (Undergrad)
basics.summary: I'm a data science student and startup founder currently working on AI applications in supply chains modeling.

work.name: Riso Data
work.summary: Building a graph database modeling agricultural supply chains in the global south in real time.
highlights: Built a data mining pipeline using vector stores and structured LLM outputs to search for and extract features from the internet.
Created partnerships with academics and farmer unions in Senegal to collect and distribute better information on supply chains.
Used: Langchain, PostgreSQL, AWS, Excel, Networking

work.name: Tera
highlights: Helped design new approaches for implementing “Large Vision Models” that can learn geospatial context.
Built a model for predicting the sell-price of houses using in-house image embeddings.

work.name: Caltech
work.summary: Paleoclimate estimation by analysis of micro elements in deep sea fossilized corals.
highlights: Processed coral samples throughout mass spectrometry.
Regularly met with lab to discuss results and maintenance of mass spectrometer.

work.name: Permissionless Labs (previously Flostream)
work.summary: Building decentralized cloud storage for businesses.
highlights: Researched new methods for pricing bandwidth in a P2P network (mathematical research)
Built CI/CD pipelines and a comprehensive automation test library (devops)
Built web application for monitoring company performance (data science / fullstack development)
Used: Python, Node.js, React.JS, Rust, PostgreSQL, Sentry, Selenium, Graph QL, Flask, Plotly/Dash, Substrate

projects.name: Text Comprehension Using LLMs for Social Good
projects.summary: Using LLMs to understand what students at UCSD struggle with by extracting discrete ideas from open-ended text documents online. Originially we were developing the tool to surver the homeless population of San Diego, but after many setbacks we pivoted to servicing the student population.

projects.name: Commodities DEX for Developing Economies
projects.summary: Riso is a blockchain based commodities exchange platform built to service agricultural markets in West Africa. I built the entire backend for it in Rust.

projects.name: Predicting the price of Rough Rice Futures (CME) using LSTMs
projects.summary: Goal: Predicting famine in areas which depend on rice for a significant portion of their daily calories. Built dataset and pipelines for financial and climate data in order to train ML Models.

projects.name: Decentralized Social Graph
projects.summary: Decentralized peer identity system that relies on a blockchain to preserve data integrity: written in Rust using the Substrate framework.

projects.name: Personal Planner
projects.summary: Built my ideal planner app which mimics roadmaps in excel, but allows for a more streamlined experience. (Don't use on mobile yet)

volunteer.summary: Tutored underprivileged kids at my local library in math and science.
Cooked meals for transitioning homeless families.
Organized and carried out three food drives with my student org in San Diego's East Village.
